EditTextPreference.android:title: Zero Pitch Range
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Defines the range in degrees around 0 in which no movement is detected. Higher means a wider range. Default is 3.

EditTextPreference.android:title: Zero Roll Range
EditTextPreference.android:summary: Defines the range in degrees around the center in which no movement is detected. Higher means a wider range. Default is 10.
